players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed on the first night. We should all share our thoughts to figure out the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm as shocked as you, Diana. We need to stay calm and share any suspicions to root out the mafioso."
You: "Alice was killed last night. I investigated Charlie and found them to be the mafioso."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated them last night and confirmed it. We need to vote them out."
Charlie: "I don't believe Bob's claim. He's probably trying to deflect suspicion onto me. We should vote for him instead."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
